verbs.description: “ [ARG1: It] [V: ’s] [ARG2: like a really bad marriage] , ” Chris Whipple , author of a history of White House chiefs of staff , said of the relationship between President Trump and his chief of staff .

“ [ARG1: It ’s like a really bad marriage] , ” [ARG0: Chris Whipple , author of a history of White House chiefs of staff ,] [V: said] [ARG3: of the relationship between President Trump and his chief of staff] .
